00029 #ifndef ELEMENT_H
00030 #define ELEMENT_H
00031 
00032 #include "Sparse.h"
00033 #include "MatrixBase.h"
00034 #include "Circuit.h"
00035 
00036 class Circuit;
00037 
00038 class Element
00039 {
00040   
00041 protected:
00042       std::string name; //The name of the element
00043 
00044 public:
00045     Element(){};
00046     virtual void write_stamp(BMatrix::Sparse<double> &G, BMatrix::Sparse<double> &C, Circuit* circ)=0;
00047     virtual bool is_linear()=0;
00048     virtual void add_my_nodes(Circuit* circuit)=0; 
00049     virtual std::string get_name(){return name;}
00050 };

00053 /*------------------------------------------*/
00055 class TwoTerminal : public Element
00056 {
00057 
00058 protected:
00059     std::string n1; //First node
00060     std::string n2; //second node
00061 public:
00062   
00063     TwoTerminal(){};
00064     TwoTerminal(std::string _n1, std::string _n2){
00065         n1 = _n1;
00066         n2 = _n2;
00067     }
00068     
00069     std::string get_n1(){return n1;}
00070     std::string get_n2(){return n2;}
00071 
00072     
00073 
00074 
00075 };
